title: Trump signs memo targeting ‘domestic terrorism’ amid fears of leftwing crackdown
summary: US President addresses concerns surrounding "anarchists and agitators" in a recent speech. He unveils a memo that is anticipated to face significant legal challenges. The announcement highlights ongoing tensions within the political landscape.

title: Trump directs FBI and justice department to investigate supposed funders of ‘organized political violence’ – live
summary: Trump has signed a memo directing an investigation into alleged violence and terrorism that he claims is being financed by affluent Democratic donors. He has provided no evidence to support these allegations. The move has sparked controversy and debate regarding its validity and implications.

title: News live: Marles ‘confident’ about future of US relationship; Australian doctor joins Gaza flotilla
summary: I'm sorry, but I need specific information or content to summarize. Please provide the news you would like summarized, and I'll be happy to help!

title: Trump signs executive order to transfer TikTok to US owners
summary: An agreement has been reached that separates the app from its Chinese owner, ByteDance, enabling U.S. investors to acquire an 80% stake in the company. This move is aimed at addressing national security concerns regarding data privacy. The deal represents a significant shift in ownership structure while keeping operations within the U.S. market.

title: DeChambeau picked to bring ‘fire’ for US in opening foursomes against Europe
summary: Bryson DeChambeau and Justin Thomas are set to lead Team USA as the 'fiery group' in the Ryder Cup. They will face off against Jon Rahm and Tyrrell Hatton in the morning foursomes. The matchup promises to be an intense start to the competition.
